Articles.Content: My pc is able to run KSP1 fine. I know this is a big step up from it, but I can’t even get past the intro clip before KSP2 crashes. What’re the odds the game will be optimized any time soon? I’ve been so excited to play.

I  was able to build and fly a rocket and only have a  R9 270 2Gb.  I could not run the tutorial and moving between buildings caused it to freeze.

How much video memory do you have ?
